Interactive Visualizations with Parasol

About

What is Parasol?

Parasol is a JavaScript library for a JavaScript library for developing parallel coordinates visualizations to enhance environmental decision making.

Features

It features interactive linked plots, a data grid, and an array of clutter reduction techniques allowing for efficient visualization of trade-offs in high-dimensional data. Parasol provides developers with a toolbox for creating their own custom, interactive PC visualizations.
